issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Make YarnRemoteException not backed by PB and introduce a SerializedException

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: YARN-634 is making YarnRemoteException to be not backed by PB anymore. Need some MR changes because of that. Tracking MR changes from the patch at YARN-634.
fields.summary: Update MR App to reflect YarnRemoteException changes after YARN-634

comments.body:
Attaching MR changes from YARN-634 on behalf of Sid.

Reviewing these changes together with those on that JIRA.
Committed this to trunk and branch-2 together with YARN-634. Closing this.

Integrated in Hadoop-trunk-Commit #3741 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/3741/])
    YARN-634. Modified YarnRemoteException to be not backed by PB and introduced a separate SerializedException record. Contributed by Siddharth Seth.
MAPREDUCE-5239. Updated MR App to reflect YarnRemoteException changes after YARN-634. Contributed by Siddharth Seth. (Revision 1481205)

     Result = SUCCESS
